snippet: The Flames let their feet slip off the gas for a moment Sunday. Just not enough to lose the momentum of this startling winning streak....

headline.main: UK Manufacturers Enjoy Post-Brexit Surge in Orders: Survey
headline.print_headline: UK Manufacturers Enjoy Post-Brexit Surge in Orders: Survey

lead_paragraph: The Flames let their feet slip off the gas for a moment Sunday. Just not enough to lose the momentum of this startling winning streak.
